about_the_game:
Melo's Nightmare


Overview:

　Melo's Nightmare is a first-person perspective 3D escape horror game.
　Players find themselves trapped in corridors and must investigate puzzles to attempt escape.
　Fulfilling the conditions to escape hidden passageways will unlock the next door.
　Activating or finding the correct puzzle triggers changes in the environment.

　In the demo version, you can play up to the first door.

Features:

A casual horror game akin to walking through a deserted amusement park haunted house.
Lacks typical scary elements found in horror games, making it suitable for beginners in the genre.
As I was unable to play "P.T.", this game serves as a light homage to it.
If you are familiar with "P.T.", rest assured there are no frightening scenes here.

Special Functionality:

Incorporates Twitch chat integration, providing enjoyment especially for streamers.
